name: Jaghund Armoured Organ Delivery Service
summary: Since the MAW Lojackers, a group of low-tech anarchists lost control of their insect horde all of society has crumbled into a battle of survival. You have one mission, and one only; you must stay alive to deliver the heart. Travis, the CEO of Orbital Biotech Deliveries, requires a heart transplant and you are the last functional drone capable of completing such a request. The Lojackers will stop at nothing to capture your cargo. Use what power you can gather to charge up any of Fujisaki Corp’s bots you might find.
